ラミ……？ 一体何が、どうなって……: Rami...? What the hell is going on...?
さっきのところから、落ちてきたんだよ！\nそしたら、気絶しちゃって全然起きないか:
It fell from that spot!
Then I'll pass out and never wake up...!!
大丈夫。みんな、無事。あなたが最後に目を覚ました。\n怪我はない？:
It's okay. Everyone's safe. You're the last one to wake up.
Are you hurt?
……大丈夫。外傷もなさそうだ……心配かけたな。: ......I'm fine. I don't think I have any injuries......sorry for worrying you.
別に～？ 全然心配なんかしてないし～？: Not really~? I'm not worried at all~?
そんなこと言って、ずっとそばから離れなかったくせに。: You said that, but you never left my side.
はあー！？ 白奈こそ、泣きそうな声してたくせにー！！: Huh?! You sound like you're about to cry, Shirona!!
わかった、わかった……それだけ元気なら十分だ……: All right, all right... If you're that energetic, that's enough...
機体はどうだ？\n俺のは、とりあえずのチェックだが……問題なさそうだ。:
What about the aircraft?
Mine is just a check... but it doesn't look like it'll be a problem.
そちらも問題ありませんわ。\n全機、損害は軽微。移動は可能でしょう。:
There's no problem with that, either.
All units, damage is minimal. It should be possible to move.
よかったです……最悪の事態は免れましたね。: Thank goodness... We managed to avoid the worst-case scenario.
だが、状況は芳しくない。\nあれからどれだけ落ちたのだろう？:
But the situation isn't looking good.
How much had she fallen since then?
ただでさえ未確認エリアでの崩落だ。\n自分達の居場所さえ、マップでは把握できない:
It's already a cave-in in an unidentified area.
They couldn't even tell where they were on the map.
一気に深い層まで落ちたせいか、\nメイズシンドロームの症状が重くなっている。:
Maybe it’s because I fell all the way to the deep levels at once
The symptoms of the mace syndrome are getting serious.
崩落による不安と疲労。\nそしてメイズシンドロームによる消耗。:
Anxiety and exhaustion from the collapse.
And wear and tear from the Maze Syndrome.
焦りと絶望が、言葉なく\nこの空間に満ちているのを感じた。:
Impatience and despair left her speechless
I felt this space fill me.
……まだだ。まだ諦めるには早い。\n進もう、出口はあるはずだ。:
...Not yet. It's too early to give up.
Let's keep going. There should be an exit.
少なくとも、ここで立ち止まるという選択肢はどこにもない。: At the very least, stopping here wasn’t an option.
俺は努めて明るくふるまう。\n士気の低下こそ、今は致命的な毒となり得るからだ。:
I try to act as cheerful as possible.
Because a drop in morale could be a fatal poison right now.
自慢してやろうぜ、こんな深くまで潜って、\n無事に戻ってきたんだぞってな。:
Let's brag about it, diving this deep,
She said she came back safely.
……へえ、いいじゃん！ 乗った！ カオスメイデン倒しただけじゃ、\n『伝説』のス:
...Wow, that's great! I'm on board! Just defeating Chaos Maiden isn't enough,
We didn't have enough Legendary stock!
……賛成！ あたし達を甘く見てたみんな、全員見返してやろ！: ...Agreed! Everyone who underestimated us will look back on us!
学園中がびっくりする偉業を打ち立てる……\nそういうことですよね！:
It's a feat that will surprise the entire school...
That's how it is!
その意気だ。まずは状況把握から、だな……: That's the spirit. We need to get a handle on the situation first...
周囲の警戒は続けていますが、\n今のところメイズシフターの気配はありません。:
We continue to keep an eye on our surroundings,
There's no sign of the maise shifter at the moment.
それはよかった。他には？: That's good to hear. Anything else?
ん？ ちょっと待って……\nあの岩、なんだか形がおかしい。:
Hm? Wait a minute...
There's something strange about the shape of that rock.
苔がすごいけど……って、岩じゃない、ＭＧの残骸……！: The moss is amazing, but... Wait, it’s not rock, it's MG wreckage...!
なんだって！ ……うわぁ、ひどいね、コレ。\nボロボロじゃない。:
What?! ...Wow, this is terrible.
It's not in tatters.
白奈が見つけたのは、メイズシフターに破壊された\n古びたＭＧのようだった。:
What Shirona found was destroyed by the Mazesifter.
It looked like an old MG.
でも一応ちょっと確認してみる。何か得られるかも。: But just in case, I'll check. I might get something out of it.
わかりましたわ。他の機体は全機周囲の警戒を。: Understood. All other aircraft, keep an eye on the surrounding area.
それからちゆるは壊れたＭＧのコックピットハッチ付近に\n自機のハッチを近づけ、機:
Then Chiyuru went near the cockpit hatch of the broken MG
I approach the hatch of my own aircraft, exit the aircraft, and examine various things.
嘘……！ システムがまだ生きてるみたい！: No way...! It looks like the system is still alive!
任せて、外からハッチの開閉も可能よ。: Leave it to me. I can open and close the hatch from the outside.
脇にあったレバーを操作し、コックピットハッチを手動で開ける。: I operated the lever at my side and manually opened the cockpit hatch.
中は空っぽみたい。損傷して動けなくなった自機を放棄して、\nパイロットは僚機に回:
It looks like it's empty inside. I abandon my damaged, immobilized self.
The pilot was recovered by the bureaucracy.
ちゆる、コンピューターユニットが無事なら、それを調べられるか？: Chiyuru, if the computer unit is safe, can you investigate it?
オッケー、ちょっと待ってね～。\nあたしの機体と繋ぐから……:
Okay, hold on a sec.
I'll connect you to my aircraft...
ん～……おおっ！？ こりゃすごい！\n地上までのルートがマッピングしてある！:
Hmm... Ohhh?! This is amazing!
The route to the surface is mapped!
本当か！？ でもどうして、学園側にはデータがないんだろ……: Really?! But why doesn't the school have any data...?
当時、データを持って帰るような時間の余裕がなかったのかもね。\nメイズシフターに:
At the time, we might not have had the time to bring back the data.
I heard she was driven into a corner by a maise shifter and had to run away in a hurry.
だからここの記録は学園に残っていないのか。: So that's why there aren't any records of this place at the academy.
よし。じゃ、みんなに共有するよ。\nただ、覚悟はしておいてね……:
Alright. I'll share it with everyone.
Just be prepared...
ちゆるの機体から、マップデータが届く。\nそれを見て、俺は愕然とする他なかった。:
Map data arrives from Chiyuru's aircraft.
Seeing that, I couldn't help but be shocked.
ここはまだ<r=プライマル・ベルト>原生帯</r>だ。\nしかしその中でもきっと:
This is still a <r-primal belt> primogenitor belt.
But I'm sure it's closer to the lowest level.
沈黙が重くのしかかる。\n無理もない、全員が理解したはずだ。:
The silence weighed heavily on me.
I can't blame them. Everyone understood.
こんな場所から戻るのに、\n燃料も弾薬も時間も──まるで足りないのでは、と。:
To get back from a place like this,
We don't have enough fuel, ammunition, or time.
本当に、ここから戻るなど、\n可能なのだろうか……:
I really can't go back from here...
I wonder if it's possible...
なんで？ なんでこんな目に遭わなきゃいけないの！？\nラミはただ……タツミヤ鉱が:
Why? Why did I have to go through all this?!
Rami just wanted...Tatsumiya Ore!!
堰を切ったように、ラミの口から\n言葉が飛び出る。だが、様子がおかしい。:
It came out of Rami’s mouth like a dam had burst
Words fly out of my mouth. But something's wrong.
いやだ！ 帰る、帰る帰る帰るっ！！\nもうこんなとこいたくないっ！！:
No! I'm going home, I'll go home!!
I don't want to be here anymore!!
スピーカーで騒がないでください！！ うるさいですわ！\nメイズシフターに気づかれ:
Please don't make a fuss over the speakers!! Shut up!
What if the maise shifter notices us?!!
うっさい、ざぁこ！！ 雑魚リーダー！！\nリーダーシップ行方不明のパツキン成金！:
Shut up, Zako!! Small fry Leader!!
Leader, the missing patkin, Seikin!!
な、なんですって！？\nそっちは年齢制限ギリギリのチビ頭身メスガキでしょう！？:
Wh-What did you say?!
Isn't that the little head and body of a female brat who's barely under the age limit!?
七彩も珍しく声を荒げる。言っている内容も、どこか彼女らしくない。\n遠慮なしに怒:
Shichika raised his voice for once. There was something uncharacteristic about what she was saying, too.
It sounded like she was just venting her anger without holding back.
……どうせ、もうわたし達は助からない。何もかも終わり。\n騒ぐことにエネルギー使:
...We can't be saved anymore anyway. Everything's over.
Rather than using energy to make a fuss, why don't you wait quietly for the end?
白奈は白奈で、酷くネガティブだ。\nまだ助からないと決まったわけじゃないのに。:
Shirona is Shirona, and she's terribly negative.
It hasn't been decided yet that she won't be saved.
あのさ、七彩ちゃん。白奈ちゃんの言う通りキミもうるさいよ。\nリーダーなら騒ぐん:
Hey, Shichika. Just like Shirona said, you're annoying too.
If you’re the leader, isn’t it your job to enjoy this place instead of making a fuss?
……いつもリーダーであろうと頑張ってるけどさ、\nキミ自身がそれを忘れがちなのは:
...I'm always doing my best to be the leader,
Don't think it's a quality that you tend to forget.
ちゆるのテンションはいつもどおりだ。だが、言葉の節々に棘がある。\n明らかに苛立:
She's as excited as ever. But there are thorns in her words.
She's clearly irritated. It's like a touchdown.
なぜかめるはこちらに、ちらちらと視線を向けている。\n一見、彼女はまともそうだが:
For some reason, she keeps glancing at me.
At first glance, she seemed decent, but—
あはは！ こんなときもイイ子ちゃんなのね、めるちゃんって。\n%username:
Ahaha! You're such a good girl at times like these, Mechan.
Maybe it's because I'm in front of %usernameusernameper%?
……ほんと、わかりやすすぎて吐き気がする。: ...It's so easy to tell that I feel like throwing up.
ひ、酷い……です……！\n私はただ……こんなときこそ、みんなで力を合わせてって…:
Th-That's... terrible...!
It's just... at times like this, we're all working together...
力を合わせる！？ いいね！ いいじゃん！ いいと思う！！\nまあ、それがこの結果:
Join forces?! That’s good! That's great! I think it’s great!!
Well, that's the result!! Serves you right----!!
（これがメイズシンドロームの深刻化による精神変調……）: (This is the mental change caused by the seriousness of the Maze Syndrome...)
長時間のメイズ潜航によるストレス。絶望的状況。\nそしてメイズシンドロームによる:
Stress from a long-term mace dive. A hopeless situation.
And then there's the malfunction caused by the mace syndrome.
きっと今、彼女達は理性を失いかけている。\nこんな状況でパニックに陥れば全滅は確:
I'm sure they're on the verge of losing their reason.
If they panicked in a situation like this, total annihilation was certain.
（おかしくなっているみんなを、正気に戻すにはどうすれば……！）: (What do I do to bring everyone back to their senses...!?)
なにか……なにかないか！？\nこの状況、空気を変える方法は……！？:
Isn't there... something!?
Is there any way to change the mood in this situation...!?
一斉にこちらに視線が向く。\nここで言葉を間違えれば、より事態は悪化する！:
They all turned to look at me at once.
If I make a mistake here, things will get even worse!
ええい……ままよ！: Argh... I'm going to do it!
みんな、聞いてくれ！\nこんな状況だからこそ、言わなきゃいけないことがあるんだっ:
Everyone, listen to me!
It's precisely because I'm in this situation that there's something I have to say!!
まさかまた世界が滅亡するとか、\nくそ寒いスベリ芸かますんじゃないでしょーね！？:
There’s no way the world will be destroyed again, or something like that
Damn it, don't you think you can pull off a cold skit?!
そう言って、俺はとっさに\nすぐそばにいた『彼女』の機体の手を握った。:
Saying that, I immediately
I grabbed the hand of “her” machine, which was right next to me.
もし、無事に帰れたら、: If I make it home safely,
……言うまでもないが、\n俺も多分半分くらいはおかしくなっていたと思う。:
...It went without saying,
I think I've probably lost about half of my mind too.
